attributes.action: Take action to ban the use of chemical weapon in Syria.
attributes.additional_details:
http://www.aljazeera.com/news/2017/04/chemical-attack-syria-170404195457304.html
he attack is a potential war crime after dozens, including children, die in the rebel-held town of Idlib province on 4th of April.
attributes.background:
While the whole world failed Syrians and kept silent in the first chemical attack in Ghouta 2013. The inaction is the only action that International community took in a chemical attack in Idlib that took the lives of civilians
the UK as leading country in the developed world should take an action
